H0.text: Who as of September 30th is Canadian prime Minister. Justin Trudeau

A4.text: Trudeau resigned as prime minister five days later and stood down as an MP at the 2025 federal election.

A5.text: Carney was sworn in as the 24th prime minister of Canada later that morning.

A6.text: Trudeau announced his resignation on January 6, 2025.

A7.text: Trudeau announced his resignation on January 6, 2025 on C-SPAN.

A8.text: The 24th and current prime minister is Mark Carney, who assumed office on 14 March 2025.

A9.text: Mark Carney was sworn in as the 24th prime minister of Canada later that morning.
